job_purpose: To design, develop, implement, and support software systems with a focus on front and back end skills, DevOps, and automation of development workflow.

Maintain and improve the performance of existing software
Communicate regularly with internal and client stakeholders
Test and maintain software products for strong functionality and ease of use

Work in a local + remote team collaboration environment

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or similar
Extensive knowledge of web technologies and development tools
Experience with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB

Experience in DevOps, Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery, and Continuous Deployment
Solid experience in AWS, plus Azure or GCP
